<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeTextureSDF"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeTextureSDF

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Performs an SDF (signed-distance field) texture lookup within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Translates to ``texture_sdf(sdf_pos)`` in the shader language.
